General.Name: Xiamen Insight Investment Co Ltd
General.Description: Xueda (Xiamen) Education Technology Group Co., Ltd. provides education and training services in China. It provides one-to-one, personalized group, and full-time tutoring; and other personalized education training services. The company also offers youth programming and robotics, learning ability improvement, academic planning, comprehensive quality evaluation, sports and language training, study abroad, and other services. The company was formerly known as Xiamen Unigroup Xue Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xueda (Xiamen) Education Technology Group Co., Ltd. in April 2021. Xueda (Xiamen) Education Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Xiamen, China.
